category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IC_SendTo_TargetApplications
preference.preference_description: Lists the different application IDs that are target applications for the context menu "Send To" in the Incremental Changes tab of the View/Edit Change dialog. An application ID is defined in an application's plugin.xml under the extension point com.teamcenter.rac.aifrcp.perspectiveDefs. Look for the property value of legacyAppId under the perspective definition.
